title: Kaanakozhikku Lyrics Suyamvaram
stanzas:
Kaanakozhikku kaluthula vella
nee ketukkadi ennoda solla (2)

samsaaram minsaaram thotta
shock-u adikkum di
sanyaasam ponaakkaa
life-u soakka irukkum di

jaadi koru moodi venumya
indha life pona
vera life laedhuyaa

Kaanakozhikku kaluthula vella
nee ketukkadi ennoda solla

samsaaram minsaaram
illatina life illa
sanyaasi aanaakkaa
adhula oru life illa

jaadi venaa lady venaadi
ammaadi ammaadi
aysha KD ponnu
jodi venaadi

Kaanakozhikku kaluthula vella
nee ketukkadi ennoda solla

beach irukkukdhu
katila kaathu adikkudhu

beach irukkukdhu
kaathu adikkudhu
alai adikkudhu
whistle adikkudhu
nandu irukkudhu
sandhu irukkudhu
sedi odhungudhu
oadi pathungudhu
samaacharatha nenachu paaruya
azhagu samsaaramthaan
unaku thevayaa

nandu samsaarithaan
samsaaramthaan
kodakulithaan adhukirudha
noi irukkuthaa
nodi irukkuthaa
... irukkudhaa
fees irukkudhaa
aaga poren bhramacharima

nee azhudhum enna
I am sorry ma

... roja poo
urasi paartha maththaapu
azhaga konja isthu poduya
nee aasapatta bitu paaruya

sela kattina
ponnungala nambithaan
periya raajakallaam
pottaan thundathaan

Kaanakozhikku kaluthula vella
nee ketukkadi ennoda solla

asai irukkudhu
nenjula paasam irukkudhu

asai irukkudhu
paasam irukkudhu
pazham irukkudhu
paluthirukkudhu
azhagirukkudhu
vayasirukkduhu
nenjil iruppadha
solla thudiikkdhu
pathinaaru pulla
pekka venumyaa
adhula record onnu
padaikka venumyaa

naadirukkudhu
neranji irukkudhu
rendu brother-u
aaru sister-u
father padichavar
mother padikkala
family planning
kaettu nadakkala
neeyum peththaa
naadu thaangumaa
un panju udambu
pinji pogumaa

adhigam peththaa guinness
illattina minus-u
unakku mattum aasaiyillayaa
naan eppozhuddhum chinna
pullaiyaa

getup paaya
paayaa paayaa thaan
naan eppodhume
single chaayaa thaan

Kaanakozhikku kaluthula vella
nee ketukkadi ennoda solla (2)

samsaaram minsaaram thotta
shock-u adikkum di
sanyaasam ponaakkaa
life-u soakka irukkum di

jaadi koru moodi venumya
indha life pona
vera life laedhuyaa
